channel.title: React Native on Sarthak Pranesh
channel.description: Recent content in React Native on Sarthak Pranesh

item.title: Covid 19
item.description: React Native project built with Typescript, that shows statistics for your country’s Corona cases, developed to run on Android, iOS, and Web with a single codebase

item.title: Wireless connection to Android Device for app development
item.description: Are you sick off hanging wires from your android devices while you test your apps on them? This blog explains how you can use ADB (Android Debug Bridge) to get rid of those hanging wires while testing and developing your app.
